metadata.description: The friendly name for the workbook that is used in the Gallery or Saved List.  This name must be unique within a resource group.
The gallery that the workbook will been shown under. Supported values include workbook, tsg, etc. Usually, this is 'workbook'
The id of resource instance to which the workbook will be associated
The unique guid for this workbook instance

## For {Message} Total Syslog Facility "},"name":"text - 3"},{"type":3,"content":{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"Syslog
| where HostName in ({HostName}) or '*' in ({HostName})
| where Facility in ({Facility}) or '*' in ({Facility})
| where SeverityLevel in ({SeverityLevel}) or '*' in ({SeverityLevel})
| summarize count(SeverityLevel) by SeverityLevel 
| extend jkey = 1
| join (Syslog
| where HostName in ({HostName}) or '*' in ({HostName})
| where Facility in ({Facility}) or '*' in ({Facility})
| where SeverityLevel in ({SeverityLevel}) or '*' in ({SeverityLevel})
  | make-series Trend = count(SeverityLevel) default = 0 on TimeGenerated from {TimeRange:start} to {TimeRange:end} step {TimeRange:grain} by SeverityLevel) on SeverityLevel

| where HostName in~ ({HostName}) or '*' in~ ({HostName})
| where Facility in~ ({Facility}) or '*' in~ ({Facility})
| where SeverityLevel in~ ({SeverityLevel}) or '*' in~ ({SeverityLevel})
| summarize SyslogCount=count(SeverityLevel) by Facility, HostName
| extend jkey = 1
| join (Syslog
        | where HostName in~ ({HostName}) or '*' in~ ({HostName})
        | where Facility in~ ({Facility}) or '*' in~ ({Facility})
        | where SeverityLevel in~ ({SeverityLevel}) or '*' in~ ({SeverityLevel})
        | make-series SyslogTimeLine = count(SeverityLevel) default = 0 on TimeGenerated from {TimeRange:start} to {TimeRange:end} step {TimeRange:grain} by Facility) on Facility
| project-away jkey, Facility1, TimeGenerated","size":0,"timeContext":{"durationMs":0},"timeContextFromParameter":"TimeRange","queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces","crossComponentResources":["{Workspace}"],"gridSettings":{"formatters":[{"columnMatch":"Facility","formatter":5,"formatOptions":{}},{"columnMatch":"SyslogCount","formatter":8,"formatOptions":{"palette":"blue"}},{"columnMatch":"SyslogTimeLine","formatter":21,"formatOptions":{"min":0,"max":1000,"palette":"green"}},{"columnMatch":"EventTimeLine","formatter":21,"formatOptions":{"min":0,"max":500,"palette":"green"}}],"hierarchySettings":{"treeType":1,"groupBy":["HostName"],"expandTopLevel":true,"finalBy":"Facility"}}},"name":"query - 5"},{"type":3,"content":{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"Syslog
| where HostName in~ ({HostName}) or '*' in~ ({HostName})
| where Facility in~ ({Facility}) or '*' in~ ({Facility})
| where SeverityLevel in~ ({SeverityLevel}) or '*' in~ ({SeverityLevel})
| extend Pack=pack_all()
| extend TimeFromNow = now() - TimeGenerated
| extend TimeAgo = strcat(case(TimeFromNow < 2m, strcat(toint(TimeFromNow / 1m), ' seconds'), TimeFromNow < 2h, strcat(toint(TimeFromNow / 1m), ' minutes'), TimeFromNow < 2d, strcat(toint(TimeFromNow / 1h), ' hours'), strcat(toint(TimeFromNow / 1d), ' days')), ' ago') 
| project ["Time"]=strcat('ðŸ•’', TimeAgo), HostName, SeverityLevel, Facility, SyslogMessage, ProcessName, ["Details"]=Pack
